Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? I 
came by because I've got something
important to tell you.
<PAGE>
It's a bit sudden, but I decided to
create a new <RED>festival</RED> for the town!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think that more people will
want to come and live in our town if
we have fun festivals?
<PAGE>
I'm going to create all kinds of
festivals as the town grows, but I'm
also counting on you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Without further ado, let me present our
town's first festival: the <RED>Crop
Festival</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There will be 4 divisions in the Crop
Festival: <RED>vegetables</RED>, <RED>fruits</RED>, <RED>flowers</RED>,
and <RED>others</RED>. Pick one and do your best!
<PAGE>
And relax... All of the crops you can
cultivate in town can be entered into
the Crop Festival.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want lots of people to participate, so
I made <BLUE>beginner, intermediate, and
advanced</BLUE> <RED>classes</RED> based on difficulty.
<PAGE>
If you win in any of the classes, your
farm's <RED>brand</RED> will improve, and
<BLUE>the shipping value of crops</BLUE> will go up.
<PAGE>
Sounds both worthwhile and fun, huh? It
would be great if you enter as a
representative of the town!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Crop Festival is held on <BLUE>day 30 of
each season</BLUE> from <BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the
<GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
On the day, be sure to come talk to me
at the festival entrance before <BLUE>3:00 PM</BLUE>,
OK?
<PAGE>
You can't compete if you're late, so
watch the time.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That explanation was long, right? You
can check the festival's details on the
<BLUE>calendar</BLUE>. Look it over if you need to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
